unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Makeover – Good News for Aspiring Homeowners!**
normalised: Home Loan Schemes Get a Makeover – Good News for Aspiring Homeowners!

unnormalised: Thinking of finally ditching that rented apartment in Bandra and buying your own piece of Mumbai? Well, listen up! Banks like HDFC and ICICI are rolling out some seriously tempting home loan schemes this Diwali.
normalised: Thinking of finally ditching that rented apartment in Bandra and buying your own piece of Mumbai? Well, listen up! Banks like H D F C and I C I C I are rolling out some seriously tempting home loan schemes this Diwali.

unnormalised: Reports suggest lower interest rates are on the cards, possibly dropping below 8% for eligible applicants. That's a huge difference when you're talking about a loan of, say, Rs. 50 Lakhs!
normalised: Reports suggest lower interest rates are on the cards, possibly dropping below eight percent for eligible applicants. That's a huge difference when you're talking about a loan of, say, rupees fifty lakhs!

unnormalised: Plus, many lenders are offering flexible repayment options. Pre-approved loans are also becoming increasingly common, making the whole process way smoother – think approval within 72 hrs!
normalised: Plus, many lenders are offering flexible repayment options. Pre-approved loans are also becoming increasingly common, making the whole process way smoother – think approval within seventy two hours!

unnormalised: Experts at Motilal Oswal are advising prospective buyers to compare schemes carefully, especially looking at processing fees and pre-payment penalties. A free camp is also planned at Delhi Haat on 26/10/2024 at 11:00 hrs where loan providers will explain the schemes in detail.
normalised: Experts at Motilal Oswal are advising prospective buyers to compare schemes carefully, especially looking at processing fees and pre-payment penalties. A free camp is also planned at Delhi Haat on twenty sixth october two thousand and twenty four at eleven o’clock hours where loan providers will explain the schemes in detail.

unnormalised: Don't just jump at the first offer you see! Do your homework and remember to check the fine print *before* signing anything. Last date for many of the special Diwali offers is 15/11/2024. Happy house hunting, and may Lakshmi bless your search! Remember RERA regulations, valid after 16/08/2016.
normalised: Don't just jump at the first offer you see! Do your homework and remember to check the fine print before signing anything. Last date for many of the special Diwali offers is fifteenth november two thousand and twenty four. Happy house hunting, and may Lakshmi bless your search! Remember R E R A regulations, valid after sixteenth august two thousand and sixteen.
